Class Sequence

java.lang.Object
  Sequence

public class Sequence
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a mathematical sequence

Author:
(Doug Vermes)

Constructor Summary
Sequence(int n)
          Creates a sequence of fractions, where each fraction is of the form 1/(n!), starting with 1/0!.

          Returns a decimal approximation of the sum of all terms of this sequence.

Constructor Detail

Sequence

public Sequence(int n)
Creates a sequence of fractions, where each fraction is of the form 1/(n!), starting with 1/0!.

Parameters:
n - The number of terms in this sequence to generate. n must be greater than or equal to 0.
Method Detail

approximateSum

public double approximateSum()
Returns a decimal approximation of the sum of all terms of this sequence.

Returns:
The sum of all of the terms of this sequence

getTerm

public Fraction getTerm(int i)
Returns the specified term.

Parameters:
i - The term to return. i must be > 0 and less than or equal to the number of terms.

sum

public Fraction sum()
Returns a decimal approximation of the sum of all terms of this sequence.

Returns:
The sum of all of the terms of this sequence
